resources.string: Enabled recording of fallback requests and responses

Get Real

Pressing this button will trigger a request that doesn't have a corresponding mock request configuration. It will allow Atlantis to fallback to the "fallbackUrl" and do a real network request.

 Get Mocked

Pressing this button will trigger a request that has a mocked response configuration. Atlantis will return the mocked content and won't even try to reach the real target url.

 Record

This action will toggle the Record mode in Atlantis. While enabled it will record all requests fetched from real servers and the corresponding response. Note that you need to have configured a fallback url for this to work.

 Save Configuration

This action will write the current configuration to a file on the file system. This will, of course, also include any recorded requests and responses.
How to use the Sample app
